General.Name: Shenzhen Ridge Engineering Consulting Co. Ltd.
General.Description: Shenzhen Ridge Engineering Consulting Co., Ltd. provides third-party evaluation, management, and consulting services. The company provides construction project quality and safety; project management; engineering management and consulting; enterprise management consulting; building material evaluation services; urban construction and supporting quality and safety evaluation services; electronic information technology and high-tech services; research, develops, and sells computer software, technology transfer, and construction engineering data platform. It offers construction engineering quality inspection, environmental inspection and monitoring, and product quality inspection; fire technology consulting services; safety production consulting services; and fire engineering consulting and technical services. The company was founded in 2010 and is based in Shenzhen, China.
General.Address: A3101, A3103, A3108, Building A, Shenzhen, China
